Desire Meets A New Taste

A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the
necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts
of sentences fly into your mouth.

On her way she met a copy. The copy warned the Little Blind Text, that
where it came from it would have been rewritten a thousand times and
everything that was left from its origin would be the word "and" and the
Little Blind Text should turn around and return to its own, safe country.

115
